title: Episode 573 - Kai Humphries
description: Comedian Kai Humphries (@kaihumphries) joins Matt, Andy and Jesse to talk aboutÂ his new special Gallivanting, the passing of Hulk Hogan, superheating solid gold, the Air Bud cinematic universe and an enormous 80,000-year-old blob in Utah.

About the Podcast

Three professional comedians and incompetent scientists take you through this week in science. Incompetently. Featuring Matt Kirshen, Andy Wood, Jesse Case and a rotating cast of special guests.
